title: R1 Green Day - Wear Watch Face
summary: R1 Green Day is dedicated to my all time favourite band
description: R1 Green Day is a simple analogue watch that displays the date and battery level.Key Features:✔ Changing Artwork every hour✔ Displays 12 Album artwork in full colour✔ Ambient mode shows an outline of the album name every hourPlease note that this has only been tested on circle faces. Please do not leave bad rating, work with us to fix the issues and make a better quality product.
descriptionHTML:
R1 Green Day is a simple analogue watch that displays the date and battery level.

Key Features:
✔ Changing Artwork every hour
✔ Displays 12 Album artwork in full colour
✔ Ambient mode shows an outline of the album name every hour

Please note that this has only been tested on circle faces. Please do not leave bad rating, work with us to fix the issues and make a better quality product.
comments: Please make a widget!!! I would love to use this app bit it won't work on an android phone. Itll be real popular if you make an app and a widget outnof this. I love the idea. Hope you make a widget....
Cant support I live green day. But I can't put it in my cell phone! Make a widget and I will love you for all eternity...
Doesn't work Doesn't work at all don't install
Well, id really love if you'd make widgets but apart from that its pretty cool
The best Green day is the best alternative band of the century
